title: Jeremy Corbyn: Labour will give our NHS, schools and police the money they need
text:

After almost a decade of Conservative cuts to vital services and tax handouts for the super-rich it’s time for real change.

This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country, take on the vested interests holding people back and ensure that no community is left behind.

The choice at this election could not be clearer.

A Labour government will be on your side, while Boris Johnson’s Conservatives – who think they’re born to rule – will only look after the privileged few.

Labour stands for the real change our country needs.

We will end the great Tory rip-off by putting rail, water and energy into public ownership so they work for everyone, not just Tory donors.

We will invest in every nation and region, rebuild our public services and give our NHS, schools and police the money they need by taxing those at the top to properly fund services for everyone.

(Image: PA)

Boris Johnson has spent months promising that we would leave the EU on October 31.

The failure to do so is his and his alone.

We will get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say within six months, with the choice of a sensible Leave deal or Remain.

And we will carry out what you decide.

Labour will be out there in every city, town and village with the biggest campaign that our party has ever mounted and our country has ever seen, bringing a message of hope and change to every community.

(Image: PA)

Labour will deal with the climate emergency.

Under a Labour government the UK will have the most ambitious climate targets of any country in the world and we will take the radical action needed to tackle the climate crisis.

We will invest in renewable energy and create 400,000 good, green jobs across the country.

We will be on the side of workers, tenants and the real wealth creators in this country.

Our radical programme will deliver higher wages, more of a say at work, workers’ shares in big companies, rent controls and a huge council-house building programme.

You can’t trust Boris Johnson with our NHS.

(Image: Peter Macdiarmid/LNP)

Labour created the health service and we will rebuild it after a decade of Tory privatisation and slashed investment.

Under Labour, our NHS will get the money it needs and we will make prescriptions and personal care free for all.

We’re ready to take them on.

We’re launching the most ambitious and radical campaign for real change that our country has ever seen.

This is a once-in-a-generation chance to build a country for the many not the few and one that’s fit for the next generation.

The future is ours to make together.
